name: LUX (NudalZmith, dgnewsom, Rockateer, HungryToast)
description:
You play as LUX the Guiding Light, helping guide the lost souls along the abyssal limbo between reality and imagination. Unfortunately, some souls where lost beyond recovery, and their "SOUL" purpose is to stop LUX from guiding the spirits to the Greater Beyond.

Credits:

Anson - Shader/VFX, Programmer

Danny - Programmer, Modelling

Abdullah - Programmer, Level Designer, Concept Artist

Will - Programmer, UI Artist

Manny - Sound Designer

Controls:

 WASD to move,

 mouse click to deposit and withdraw souls from bonfire,

 ESC to return to menu

Known Issue:
Level 1 requires 5 souls to complete
